title: I'm a straight girl. Why do I enjoy BL books so much? And is it wrong to? - Quora

response.answer_text: it more depends why you enjoy those books. why do you have a preference of mlm over straight couples or wlw couples? do you find hetero love stories typical and boring, and the storylines of mlm to be a lot more engaging? are you bored of hetero relationships in media in general and feel like this is something new? do you find mlm couples more attractive than straight ones, and enjoy reading about two people of the same gender you’re attracted to more than only one? which is also why you dont seem to be into wlw stories? do you like the characters themselves and find that you just like them together the same way you’d like a straight couple? in my opinion, of course it’s not wrong to appreciate a mlm relationship in writing. but if you only like reading about boys doing weird sexual shit because you think it’s hot, that’s not good at all. that’s fetishizing a whole group of people and that’s disgusting. it’s just the opposite of the idea of typical straight guys watching lesbian porn. so tldr: figure out why you enjoy these books, because it’s not wrong to like a gay relationship, but it is wrong to fetishize it.
